pizza.name: The Godfather Pizza
pizza.description: Gourmet Italian sausage, fresh garlic, onions & Rosati’s hot giardiniera.

pizza.name: The Veggie Pizza
pizza.description: Vegetarian. Mushrooms, onions & green peppers with tomatoes on top.

pizza.name: White Pizza
pizza.description: Vegetarian. Olive oil, fresh garlic & sauteed spinach with tomatoes on top (no pizza sauce).

pizza.name: The Hawaiian Pizza
pizza.description: A blend of Rosati’s pizza & BBQ sauces, topped with Canadian bacon & pineapple.

pizza.name: Meat Mania Pizza
pizza.description: Gourmet Italian sausage, meatballs & pepperoni with bacon on top.

pizza.name: Fabulous Four Pizza
pizza.description: Gourmet Italian sausage, mushrooms, onions & green peppers.
